paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: No BRCA2 variants were mentioned in the paper. The paper focused on LKB1/STK11 mutations in Peutz–Jeghers syndrome.

extraction_metadata.notes: The paper focused exclusively on LKB1/STK11 mutations related to Peutz–Jeghers syndrome, with no mention of BRCA2 variants.
